job.title: General Manager Task Force
job.description:
The Hampton Inn, Wilmington/Christina, 1008 Old Churchman’s Road, Newark, DE is ready for you to join us as a Task Force General Manager. (With the ability to apply for the Full Time General Manager position)

If you have a passion for hospitality and want to be a part of TBC Hotels, a progressive, exciting hotel company, we think it would be incredible to hear from you… Are you currently an Assistant General Manager, an Operations Manager, or perhaps a Hotel General Manager looking to make a move?  Do not let this Task Force opportunity pass you by.  

The Hampton Inn is looking to add an exceptional leader to our team. We are looking for a very “hands on” Task Force General Manager, to bring their talents to our hotel. Is this you? At least one year of hotel operational experience is required. If you have knowledge of OnQ, or Hilton experience, it is a major plus. It goes without saying that you must be dependable, ability to work a flexible schedule, and bring your smile and positive vibes with you every day! We are going to be picky as we are looking for the right puzzle piece to add to our family. If you are trying to find a new opportunity where everyone brings next level hospitality, please apply!
